channel.title: Stickscape
channel.description:
I'm going to make a game using noobscape as a base. Your character will be a stick man of course and I think it could be really fun. It's not going to use any graphics from rsc and will have a totally new map. It currently concept but I thought you guys/girls might want to throw around some ideas?
Here's some 2d games I will take my inspirations from : http://www.ifthensoftware.net/StickAdventuresOnline/screenshots.php and http://www.stick-online.com/boards/index.php?topic=32.0
Front View 100% http://yfrog.com/0estick0001z

item.title: Stickscape
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

For the idiot’s that can’t quite comprehend what the OP is trying to do/explain:

He is using the RSC Engine to make an entirely new game. See this thread to understand what he is attempting to do: http://jaghax.org/index.php?topic=24.0 (Avail is Taharok)

Source: http://jaghax.org/rsclient/games/frog.jar

Read full topic

item.title: Stickscape
item.dc:creator: @pompio pompio
item.description:
@pompio wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:12, topic:340029”][quote author=Zecronious link=topic=436404.msg3207827#msg3207827 date=1273964349]
This will not have any armor or weapons from Runescape. In-fact it should have hardly anything related to Runescape on it. It is not a conversion mod, it is it’s own game. This is means there won’t be stick dragon axes or stick runeplates, there will however be armor and weapons created by me. Okay?
[/quote]

Then why is this here.[/quote]

Because he is using rsc engine and im sure people would be intrested to see how this turns out

Read full topic

item.title: Stickscape
item.dc:creator: @pompio pompio
item.description:
@pompio wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:9, topic:340029”][quote author=Zecronious link=topic=436404.msg3207308#msg3207308 date=1273926509]
Hey Yong Min, It’s Xanth/Snake Logan from PP2P if you can remember me.

Anyway, It’s not a total conversion mod. At the end it should be it’s own game if you get what I’m saying. I’m not going through all the grahpics and making them stick styles, I’m creating a unique game with this engine. I’m about 30% done on the character for now.
[/quote]

It will be intresting to see how it turns out. I would change all items to if it was stick man otherwise it would look very strange.
So your having stick men with dragon axes? No you would need to make the dragon axe and stick axe as well. I dont understand.[/quote]

Read full topic
